column4: Hi. I'm looking for a file-tagging solution (standalone software, nautilus add-on, anything) that allows me to tag files and subsequently search using these tags. Anyone knows if such a thing exists please?
Please dont double paste, we are volunteers, we help you if we can, otherwise, we dont know the answer
sorry I saw Chanserv kicking me, I thought my msg didn't deliver
nah, no problem at all, just a friendly reminder :)
